title: Is Test Gluten Free?
description: Learn how BiteRight evaluates whether Test is gluten free and what to ask before you eat.

faq.question: What does BiteRight check?
faq.answer: We scan ingredients, preparation methods, and cross-contamination risks to provide a safe, caution, or unsafe assessment.

faq.question: Is this a medical diagnosis?
faq.answer: No. BiteRight provides guidance only. Always confirm with staff if you have coeliac disease or severe gluten intolerance.
